summary: This is an email exchange between FBI agents discussing logistics for an upcoming search of Jeffrey Epstein's island in St. Thomas. The email shows coordination for additional manpower needed for the operation scheduled for August 11-14, 2019.

persons.name: SSA- Squad C-20
persons.context: The sender of the initial request for extra manpower to execute a search on Epstein's island in St. Thomas from August 11-14, 2019.

connections.description: FBI colleagues coordinating logistics for a law enforcement operation; SSA- Squad C-20 requests additional manpower from M for the search of Epstein's island.

events.title: Search of Epstein's Island in St. Thomas
events.description: Planned FBI operation to execute a search on Jeffrey Epstein's island in St. Thomas, requiring additional manpower.

events.title: Email Coordination for St. Thomas Search
events.description: Email exchange between FBI agents discussing and coordinating logistics for the upcoming search operation on Epstein's island.

keyFacts: The FBI was planning to execute a search on Jeffrey Epstein's island in St. Thomas in August 2019.
The search operation was scheduled for August 11-14, 2019, requiring additional manpower from the FBI's New York office.
The email shows active FBI investigation and coordination related to Epstein's properties after his arrest.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) was involved in the operation.
